item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Well just to let you know its going to get locked because…

! Notice To All People !

1 . ANY Spam Will Be Immediatly Reported, OR Any Other Materials Breaking The Rules. Replies From Me To Say That A Person Has Been Reported Is NOT Spam.
2 . Any Pm’s to me, “Breaking The Bridge” about questions you have already posted will be deleted. It’s just taking my time and message room up so please stop.
3. Please Read All Of The Information Below. It Might Help You From Being Stupid And Asking Questions That Have Been Answered A Ka-Gillion Years Ago.
4 . Any Other Help Threads Will Be Locked, This Is The Final Help Topic, Notice How It Says “Official Help Thread”?
Thanks,
Breaking The Bridge And Melissa T

item.title: Read Here Before You Post
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

[quote=“soalreaver, post:2, topic:80502”]Link to the tut you was adding N/A
Bit what your was getting errors with N/A
Pictures or the error or the error in code tagsN/A

Just need help getting beards to work on testscape >.<[/quote]

go to player . java search for

			if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) {

now look for

		// array of 5 bytes defining the colors

if there is anything between that and

if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet); }

replace it with

[code] if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
else

		playerProps.writeByte(0);
	} else {
		playerProps.writeWord(-1);
		playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

	}

[/code]

if there is nothing between them just put it under

if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet); }

hope this helps

n0va

item.title: Read Here Before You Post
item.dc:creator: @eekz eekz
item.description:
@eekz wrote:

Ok here i go

b]Step 1 -[/b]Open your Player.java file.(the Txt file for the less experienced)
Step 2 -Search for:

// array of 5 bytes defining the colors

Step 3 -Look for Something like this:

if (isNpc == false) { if (playerEquipment[playerHat] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHat]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerCape]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerAmulet]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerWeapon]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerChest] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerChest]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pTorso); } if (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerShield]); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (!Item.isPlate(playerEquipment[playerChest])) { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pArms); } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerLegs] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerLegs]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pLegs); } if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat])) { playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHead); // head } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerHands] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHands]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pHands); } if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]); } else { playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet); } playerProps.writeByte(0); } else { playerProps.writeWord(-1); playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

Step 4 -Delete ALL of that and replace with this:
[code]if (isNpc == false) {
if (playerEquipment[playerHat] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHat]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerCape]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerAmulet]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerWeapon]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerChest] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerChest]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pTorso);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerShield] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerShield]);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (!Item.isPlate(playerEquipment[playerChest])) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pArms);
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerLegs] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerLegs]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pLegs);
}
if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat])) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHead); // head
} else {
playerProps.writeByte(0);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerHands] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHands]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pHands);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerFeet] > 1) {
playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerFeet]);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(0x100+pFeet);
}
if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1))
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard
else
playerProps.writeByte(0);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(-1);
playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Read Here Before You Post
item.dc:creator: @eekz eekz
item.description:
@eekz wrote:

Hello this thread is to prevent the same questions being asked over and over again. I will also try my hardest to help peoples errors and problems to ask for help with anything pleas use this format

[b]Link to the tut you was adding[/b] [b] Bit what your was getting errors with[/b] [b] Pictures or the error or the error in code tags[/b]

Helper of this thread
.Me

To become a helper post a application form using this layout

[b]Grade your self with a mark out off 1 to 10  [/b]
[b]any links you can provide of a thread were you have helped some on successfully [/b]
[b]why should i pick you from th rest[/b]

Frequently asked questions

How do i get my compiler to work ?

step 1 Right click your compiler.bat and click edit

step 2 Delete every thing and replace with this


CLS

:index
	
CLS
@COLOR 0c
@Title my compiler by eekz
	
@ECHO By eekz
	
@ECHO -
	
@ECHO Type 1 to run the server
	
@ECHO Type 2 to compile	
	
@ECHO Type 3 to load the mopar client	
	
@ECHO Type 4 to load hamachi	
	
@ECHO Type 5 to load no-ip	
	
@SET option=
	
@ECHO - 
	
@ECHO off
	
SET /p option=What Do You Choose? 
	
if %option%==1 goto run
	
if %option%==2 goto c

if %option%==3 goto mc
	
if %option%==4 goto h

if %option%==5 goto n
	
CLS

goto info
:run

CLS
COLOR 0c
@echo off
title Run server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
	
CLS

goto info
:c

CLS
@echo off
Title Compiler
color 0c
echo Compiling...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac" *.java -nowarn *.java
color 0c
SET /p option=Go Back To Start? 
	
if %option%==yes goto index	



pause 
CLS

goto info
:mc

CLS
@echo off
Title mopar loader
color 0c
echo Loading...
"C:\Program Files\MoparScape\MoparScape.jar
color 0c
SET /p option=Go Back To Start? 
	
if %option%==yes goto index	


CLS

goto info
:h

CLS
COLOR 0c
title Hamachi Starter
@echo Starting Hamachi...
"C:\Program Files\Hamachi\hamachi.exe"
SET /p option=Go Back To Start? 
	
if %option%==yes goto index	


CLS

goto info
:n

CLS
COLOR 0c
title No-Ip Starter
@echo Starting No-Ip...
"C:\Program Files\No-IP\duc20.exe"
SET /p option=Go Back To Start? 
	
if %option%==yes goto index	


CLS

step 3 Change the jdk1.6.0 in the text i just gave you to your version

step 4 Save it and close

How do change item name ?

step 1 You going to need a client for this go
here

step 2 Go this link

How go i change the max combat level to 126?

Step 1: Go to player.java and search this

int mag = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);

and you should see this

[code]
/*int mag = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
int ran = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
int attstr = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));

	int combatLevel = 0;
	if (ran > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875));
	} else if (mag > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875));
	} else {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325));
	}
	playerProps.writeByte(combatLevel);		// combat level
	playerProps.writeWord(0);			// incase != 0, writes skill-%d

	str.writeByteC(playerProps.currentOffset);		// size of player appearance block
	str.writeBytes(playerProps.buffer, playerProps.currentOffset, 0);
}*/


	int mag = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
	int ran = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
	int attstr = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));

	int combatLevel = 0;
	if (ran > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.5) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.4) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.35) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.3));
	} else if (mag > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.5) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.4) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.35) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.3));
	} else {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.5) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.4) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.35) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.3) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325));
	}

            combat = combatLevel;
	playerProps.writeByte(combatLevel);		// combat level
	playerProps.writeWord(0);			// incase != 0, writes skill-%d
		str.writeByteC(playerProps.currentOffset);		// size of player appearance block
		str.writeBytes(playerProps.buffer, playerProps.currentOffset, 0);
	}[/code]

Now replace that with Zoltmans

[code]/*int mag = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
int ran = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
int attstr = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));

	int combatLevel = 0;
	if (ran > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875));
	} else if (mag > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875));
	} else {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325));
	}
	playerProps.writeByte(combatLevel);		// combat level
	playerProps.writeWord(0);			// incase != 0, writes skill-%d

	str.writeByteC(playerProps.currentOffset);		// size of player appearance block
	str.writeBytes(playerProps.buffer, playerProps.currentOffset, 0);
}*/


	int mag = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5);
	int ran = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5);
	int attstr = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));

	int combatLevel = 0;
	if (ran > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875));
	} else if (mag > attstr) {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875));
	} else {
		combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325));
	}

            combat = combatLevel;
	playerProps.writeByte(combatLevel);		// combat level
	playerProps.writeWord(0);			// incase != 0, writes skill-%d
		str.writeByteC(playerProps.currentOffset);		// size of player appearance block
		str.writeBytes(playerProps.buffer, playerProps.currentOffset, 0);
	}[/code]

Credits Zoltman

I will add more later for now this is it
